Miscellaneous

  • ISHII (石井) is a popular surname in Japan. Shun is also common, but the corresponding kanji (竣) is rarely used for names. The only example I know of this character being used in everyday language is the word 竣工 (or 竣成), which means completion of construction.

  • Other than mathematics, I enjoy reading books, keeping a diary, hiking in mountains and taking pictures. I introduce some of my favorite books at this page. You can find some photos I took here (Warning! the page won’t open since the photo files are too large).

  • Mathematicians (without honorifics) :

    • Naganori Yamaguchi
    • Yota Maeda
    • Séverin Philip
    • Densuke Shiraishi
sishii1214.github.io is maintained by sishii1214.
